page.title: 11Education In Our Area
page.content: Education is a large subject all over our 12 squares.Weston Turville School itself has over 200 pupils and is still growing.In 1983 it had 6 classes,one year later it had 7.The school times are currently being changed from 9-3.45 to 9-3.30 .The playgroup in the village hall operates every morning and in the evening there is ballet and short tennis. In Bedgrove there are two schools providing education to one of the largest housing estates in Britain.Both schools(both having over 250 pupils) start at 9 but the first school ends at 3.15pm and the middle at 3.30pm.There are 2 playgroups,1 at the pavilion,and 1 at the church.Soon there will be a nursery school at the First School which will give young children the chance to work in a primary school.
